GameSaveManager_Translation.Title: Checking for Updates
GameSaveManager_Translation.Info:
As with all software, GameSave Manager has regular updates. This page will list any available updates for you.
Click the icon on the left to recheck for updates.
GameSaveManager_Translation.Recheck: Queries the servers again for update information.

ProgramUpdate.Title: Program Update
ProgramUpdate.Info: It's highly recommended that you run the latest version of GameSave Manager. Program Updates add new features, fix known bugs and generally improve GameSave Manager for the better.

LangPack.Title: Translation Pack
LangPack.Info: No 'Program Update' detected. However, the author of the Translation Pack you're using has issued an update.

DatabaseUpdate.Title: Database Update
DatabaseUpdate.Info: While Database Updates aren't as important as Program Updates, they add support for more games and fix detection issues with existing entries. Therefore, we recommend you update your Database at least once a week.

GameSaveManager_Translation.DialogPrompt:
There appears to be either a 'Program Update' or 'Database Update' available for you.
Would you like to visit the Updates page?

Errors.UpdateRequired: Database Update available; requires latest Program Update.
Errors.NoConnection: Unable to query website for release information. Please try again later.
